YouTube™ Video: Steam Cleaning - Paws & Claws: Pampered Pets 

			Views: 73		

			When a tragic shearing accident kills off all of your family this billionaire philanthropist decides to numb the pain by washing the pets of the 1% elite, but only about four a day.		

When a tragic shearing accident kills off all of your family this billionaire philanthropist decides to numb the pain by washing the pets of the 1% elite, but only about four a day.This slow paced animal care simulation may not be challenging or a lot of fun, but it's at least forgiving as you ignore the owner's style request and substitute your own.Note: This game is supposed to have cats but none were seen
